name: Beware (Ondrej_Svadlena)
description:
Beware is currently in early development. At the base, it's an open-world driving simulation where the player embarks on a long journey of information-gathering through exploration. One of the gameplay elements are intense, 70's movies style, car chases with challenging AI opponents. There are stealth element too where you can avoid being detected and explore the world undisturbed. Support further development on patreon.com/ondrejsvadlena !
v001 adds a couple of new features:
1) you can now switch on electricity for the entire map - find the big dam and flip the switch at the powerstation.
2) controller support (experimental)
3) manual shifting
4) wipers
5) more usable headlights
6) ragdoll goons
7) default WASD
